name: MXMetaData
desc: An object containing system-level information about the device.

items.name: var applicationBuildVersion: String
items.desc: The value of the bundle version key in the app's property list.

items.name: var deviceType: String
items.desc: The hardware identifier for the device.

items.name: var osVersion: String
items.desc: The version of the OS on the device including the type of OS, version number, and build number.

items.name: var regionFormat: String
items.desc: The short country code for the region format setting of the device.

items.name: var platformArchitecture: String
items.desc: The name of the processor architecture for the device.

items.name: func jsonRepresentation() -> Data
items.desc: Returns the contents of the metadata in JSON format.
